headline: PG&E Corporation (PCG): Among the Worst Performing Utilities Stocks to Buy According to Analysts
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 10 Worst Performing Utilities Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. In this article, we are going to take a look at where PG&E Corporation (NYSE:PCG) stands against the other bad performing utilities stocks. As 2025 kicks off, the global energy sector continues to face a volatile and fast-moving landscape, says […]

headline: Useless High-Voltage Power Lines Risk Sparking California Fires

headline: Dates Set for PG&E Quarterly Stock Dividends
summary: On February 20, 2025, PG&E Corporation (NYSE: PCG) declared its first quarter 2025 regular cash dividend of $0.025 per share on the Corporation's common stock. The dividend is payable on April 15, 2025, to shareholders of record as of March 31, 2025.
